data.name: OneShot: Fading Memory
data.detailed_description:
OneShot: Fading Memory is currently in early access! Mods on steam cannot be marked as early access unfortunately, so that's why it does not show up as an early access game.




OneShot: Fading Memory is a fan continuation of the puzzle game, OneShot.
In it, after the events of solstice, you find yourself and Niko placed into a strange new reality similar to
the one you knew before.

However, something is... wrong.

Niko is wrong.
The world is wrong.
You are wrong.

Nothing is right...

FEATURES

  • A dystopian reimagining of OneShot's world.
  • Puzzles that stretch beyond the window.
  • A brand new original soundtrack.
  • A relentless sense of regret.
  • A new and dystopian open world.
  • Choices you never wanted.
  • More consequences than you could imagine.

SOLSTICE SAVES

This mod takes place after solstice and needs a solstice save. It should migrate your save automatically.
A solstice skip is coming in the near future.
Please do not complain about not being able to get into the modded portions.

THE RIGHT THING TO DO

There is no right or wrong here. It doesn't care what you say or do.
Don't bother even thinking about it.

CONTENT WARNING

Like OneShot, OneShot: Fading Memory is not a traditional horror game.
However, this mod goes far deeper into the horror than OneShot does.
It is closer to the freeware version of OneShot than the steam remake.
It will mess with you. You have been warned.

data.short_description: OneShot: Fading Memory is a fan continuation of the puzzle game, OneShot.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Vista or later
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: i386 is not supported.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: i386 is not supported.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any recent linux distro
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some rolling release distros have issues. i386 is not supported.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Any recent linux distro
  • Processor: Any 64 bit processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Some rolling release distros have issues. i386 is not supported.
